const add = (a, b) => a + b;

const range = (l) => {
  let i = -1;
  let res = [];
  while (++i < l) {

const L = {};

L.range = function* (l) {
  let i = -1;

  while (++i < l) {
    yield i;
  }
};

const list = L.range(4);
console.log(reduce(add, list));

Reduce ë‚´ë¶€ í•¨ìˆ˜ë¥¼ í†µí•´ Rangeì™€ L.Range ë¹„êµ

  • ìœ„ RangeëŠ” reduceë¥¼ ì‹¤í–‰í–ˆì„ ë•Œ, Arrayë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê³  â†’ Iteratorë¥¼ ë§Œë“¤ê³  ê·¸ë¦¬ê³  ìˆœíšŒí•˜ë©´ì„œ next()ë¡œ ê°’ì„ ì–»ì–´ì„œ ì¶•ì•½ í•¨

const reduce = curry((f, acc, iter) => {
  if (!iter) {
    iter = acc[Symbol.iterator]();
    acc = iter.next().value;
  }

  for (const a of iter) {
    acc = f(acc, a);
  }
  return acc;
});

L.rangeì™€ range ì„±ëŠ¥ í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸

function test(name, time, f) {
  console.time(name);
  while (time--) f();
  console.timeEnd(name);
}

// í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ê²°ê³¼
// L.range: 257.204833984375ms
// range: 489.680908203125ms
test('range', 10, () => reduce(add, range(1000000)));

const curry = (f) => (a, ..._) => (_.length ? f(a, ..._) : (..._) => f(a, ..._));

const map = curry((f, iter) => {
  let res = [];
  for (const a of iter) {
    res.push(f(a));
  }
  return res;
});

const filter = curry((f, iter) => {
  let res = [];
  for (const a of iter) {
    if (f(a)) res.push(a);
  }
  return res;
});

const reduce = curry((f, acc, iter) => {
  if (!iter) {
    iter = acc[Symbol.iterator]();
    acc = iter.next().value;
  }
  for (const a of iter) {
    acc = f(acc, a);
  }
  return acc;
});

const go = (...args) => reduce((a, f) => f(a), args);

const pipe = (f, ...fs) => (...as) => go(f(...as), ...fs);


ì´ ìˆ˜ëŸ‰ êµ¬í•˜ê¸°

];

	products,

	reduce((a,b) => a + b),  // 15
)

	map(p => p.quantity),
	reduce(add);

	map(p => p.quantity),
	reduce(add);

console.log(total_quantity(products));  // 15

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>

const products = [
  { name: 'ë°˜íŒ”í‹°', price: 15000, quantity: 1, is_selected: true },
  { name: 'ê¸´íŒ”í‹°', price: 20000, quantity: 2, is_selected: false },
  { name: 'í•¸ë“œí°ì¼€ì´ìŠ¤', price: 15000, quantity: 3, is_selected: true },
  { name: 'í›„ë“œí‹°', price: 30000, quantity: 4, is_selected: false },
  { name: 'ë°”ì§€', price: 25000, quantity: 5, is_selected: false },
];

const add = (a, b) => a + b;

const sum = curry((f, iter) => go(iter, map(f), reduce(add)));

const total_quantity = sum((p) => p.quantity);

const total_price = sum((p) => p.price * p.quantity);

document.querySelector('#cart').innerHTML = `
    <table>
      <tr>
        <th></th>
        <th>ìƒí’ˆ ì´ë¦„</th>
        <th>ê°€ê²©</th>
        <th>ìˆ˜ëŸ‰</th>
        <th>ì´ ê°€ê²©</th>
      </tr>
      ${go(
        products,
        sum(
          (p) => `
          <tr>
            <td><input type="checkbox" ${p.is_selected ? 'checked' : ''}></td>
            <td>${p.name}</td>
            <td>${p.price}</td>
            <td><input type="number" value="${p.quantity}"></td>
            <td>${p.price * p.quantity}</td>
          </tr>
      `,
        ),
      )}
      <tr>
        <td colspan="3">í•©ê³„</td>
        <td>${total_quantity(filter((p) => p.is_selected, products))}</td>
        <td>${total_price(filter((p) => p.is_selected, products))}</td>
      </tr>
    </table>
  `;
